text: Casino Monte-Carlo, officially called Casino de Monte-Carlo, is a gambling and entertainment place located in Monaco. The Casino de Monte-Carlo is owned and operated by the "Société des bains de mer de Monaco". ==History== The idea of opening a gambling casino in Monaco came from Princess Carolina, the wife of Prince Florestan. The company's money was supposed to save the House of Grimaldi from bankruptcy. In 1921, the first Women’s Olympiad was held at the casino gardens. == References == Category:Monte Carlo Category:Casinos
title: Monte Carlo Casino
